author: plantman
title: Lego promotional zombie chauffeur and car
review: Just received this promotional polybag with my last Lego order.  As it was free, it is already a winner.  If you didn't get this while Lego was giving them away, don't worry.  While it is neat to have, you wouldn't be missing anything if you don't get it.  The zombie is the same one that comes with The Vampyre Hearse set 9464 and The Zombies 9465.  The little car is not spectacular and doesn't appear to contain any rare parts (comes with one additional glowing spider).
